tool_description: Carbon Footprint Calculator API enables developers to calculate the carbon footprint of various products and services. It allows businesses to measure and reduce their environmental impact and promote sustainability.
name: Carbon Footprint Calculator API
title: Carbon Footprint Calculator API

api_list.name: Air Quality Health Index
api_list.description: Return the official air quality health index (1 to 10) bases on key parameters.The national AQHI is based on three-hour average concentrations of ground-level ozone (O3), nitrogen dioxide (NO2), and fine particulate matter (PM2.5). O3 and NO2 are measured in parts per billion (ppb) while PM2.5 is measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3).

required_parameters.name: o3
required_parameters.description: The ground-level ozone (O3) in parts per billion (ppb).

required_parameters.name: no2
required_parameters.description: The nitrogen dioxide (NO2), in parts per billion (ppb).

required_parameters.name: pm
required_parameters.description: The fine particulate matter (PM2.5), PM2.5 is * measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3).

api_list.name: Public Transit
api_list.description: Return CO2e in Kg from the use of public transporation.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of transportation (Taxi, ClassicBus, EcoBus, Coach, NationalTrain, LightRail, Subway, FerryOnFoot, FerryInCar).

api_list.name: MotorBike
api_list.description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a motorbike travel.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of motorbike (SmallMotorBike, MediumMotorBike, LargeMotorBike).

api_list.name: Flight
api_list.description: Calculate CO2e in Kg from a travel by air.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of flight (DomesticFlight, ShortEconomyClassFlight, ShortBusinessClassFlight, LongEconomyClassFlight, LongPremiumClassFlight, LongBusinessClassFlight, LongFirstClassFlight).

api_list.name: Car Travel
api_list.description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car.

required_parameters.name: vehicle
required_parameters.description: The type of car (SmallDieselCar, MediumDieselCar, LargeDieselCar, MediumHybridCar, LargeHybridCar, MediumLPGCar, LargeLPGCar, MediumCNGCar, LargeCNGCar, SmallPetrolVan, LargePetrolVan, SmallDielselVan, MediumDielselVan, LargeDielselVan, LPGVan, CNGVan, SmallPetrolCar, MediumPetrolCar, LargePetrolCar).

api_list.name: Fuel To CO2e
api_list.description: Transform liters of Diesel, Petrol or LPG into CO2 Equivalent in Kg.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type can be Petrol, Diesel, LPG.

required_parameters.name: litres
required_parameters.description: The number of litres to calculate from.

api_list.name: Clean Energy
api_list.description: Return the CO2e in Kg from the consumption of clean energy.

required_parameters.name: consumption
required_parameters.description: The amount of energy consumed in KWH.

required_parameters.name: energy
required_parameters.description: The source of the clean energy (Solar, Wind, HydroElectric, Biomass, Geothermal, Tidal, OtherCleanEnergy).
